name: just-for-release
description: This package is just for releasing the extension

scripts.pre-package: npm run build && rimraf dist && copyfiles -u 1 "src{/*,}/{vss-extension.json,task.json,package.json,*.png,*.js,/!(tests)/*.js}" dist -E && copyfiles README.md LICENSE dist -E && cd ./dist/freestyle && npm install --only=prod
scripts.package: npm run pre-package && cd ./dist && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.publish: cd ./dist && cross-env-shell 'tfx extension publish --auth-type pat -t $MARKETPLACE_TOKEN --service-url "https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/" --manifest-globs vss-extension.json'

plugins.publishCmd: npm run publish && npm run azpipeline-tag
